Articles.Content:
I just installed 1.0 and found that the textures are really choppy. Is this something that was added or am I just being dumb? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

[http://imgur.com/a/ZEByT](http://imgur.com/a/ZEByT)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T13:56:13Z" title="04/28/2015 01:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by Shurikeeen**
Woops, the texture resolution was at half res. I swear I checked that before ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
